articles.title: Soccer-Bournemouth sign Argentina defender Senesi from Feyenoord
articles.description: Bournemouth did not disclose the fee but British media said the transfer was worth about 15 million euros ($15.29 million). "This is a huge signing for us and Marcos brings significant pedigree to our squad," Bournemouth chief executive Neill Blake told the club's website https://www.afcb.co.uk/news/first-team/senesi-signs-for-the-cherries.
articles.content: Newly-promoted Bournemouth have signed Argentina defender Marcos Senesi on a four-year contract from Dutch Eredivisie side Feyenoord, the Premier League club said on Monday. Bournemouth did not disclose the fee but British media said the transfer was... [1658 chars]

articles.title: Marcos Senesi explains his key attributes after completing 'dream' Premier League move to Bournemouth
articles.description: AFC Bournemouth have completed the signing of Argentina international defender Marcos Senesi on a four-year contract from Feyenoord.
articles.content:
Bournemouth have completed the signing of Argentina international defender Marcos Senesi on a four-year contract.
Senesi has signed for the Cherries from Eredivisie outfit Feyenoord, with whom he reached the Europa Conference League final last season... [1766 chars]

articles.description: LONDON (AP) — Argentina defender Marcos Senesi signed for Bournemouth on Monday two days after the newly promoted club made a winning start in the Eng...
articles.content:
LONDON (AP) — Argentina defender Marcos Senesi signed for Bournemouth on Monday two days after the newly promoted club made a winning start in the English Premier League.
Bournemouth said the 25-year-old Senesi signed a four-year contract but did not... [500 chars]

articles.description: What started as an unofficial holiday has now become law in Brazil with many countries including Spain, Peru, Argentina coming forward to join the movement
articles.content:

articles.title: Rugby-Argentina's Sanchez out of second test v Australia as Delguy called up
articles.description: Argentina have called up wing Bautista Delguy for their second Rugby Championship clash with Australia, in San Juan on Saturday, but experienced flyhalf Nicolas Sanchez has been released from the squad through injury.

articles.description: Bou, who has come a long way from the Argentina barrio, shared his thoughts on Boston, the Revolution, his beginnings, and how to cook short ribs.
articles.content: The minute the video crew leaves, he is ambushed from behind and pelted mercilessly in a family water balloon fight. The drenched Panther takes prisoners. He gleefully carries his daughter Martina, 7, and then his wife Marisol, both fully clothed, in... [8742 chars]

articles.description: Argentina's economy chief names new energy secretary
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES (Reuters) - Argentina's economy chief Sergio Massa appointed on Sunday a new head of the energy secretariat, which in recent years has doled out multi-million dollar subsidies that have led to a widening budget deficit.

articles.description: Quade’s RWC dream in doubt after devastating injury blow leaves No.10 jersey wide open
